keynote.title: Diving into Social commerce
keynote.description: Sanjeev Barnwal is the Co-founder and CTO of Meesho, the social commerce platform. After completing his course at IIT, Sanjeev joined Sony in Japan. He was a part of the core tech team that developed the companyâ€™s digital single-lens reflex camera (DSLR), and cyber-shot cameras. Today, at Meesho, building great tech still remains his passion.
